bgm.name: 3 A Golden Sky at the End of the Storm

parameters: Well, you said you haven't been here in a thousand years, right?
No, it was. I'm sure of it. The shards are still warm. If I had
to guess, I would say this happened less than a day ago.
What we learned at the camp is accurate. \C[4]\N[5]\C[0]
is leading them right to the \C[6]Wardstones\C[0].
Then we can't delay. \C[4]Davos\C[0], you said there was a
hidden cave that lead to the seal?
Aye, and to the desert beyond, and the second \C[6]Wardstone\C[0].
The entrance lies at the northern tip of the mountain range outside
Let's go. If we hurry, maybe we can catch up to them!
How much you reckon we can fence these for,
Enough that we can get outta this hellhole, that's fer sure!
Who cares? As long as some sucker pays good money for 'em!
Hey, buzz off! We got here first!
Yeah, finders keepers, losers... uhm... don't get nothin'!
Don’t think, it might sprain your brain.
Wait a second. Hey \C[2]Johnny\C[0], don't this chick look
Yeah! That's the girl we almost killed back in \C[6]Kaliko Village\C[0]!
Is that right? Because the way I remember it, the last thing
I saw was your tail tucked between your legs climbing through
Enough talkin'. Let's teach these thieves a lesson!
Big words coming from a... oh forget it. Let's go!
Yeah, now get outta here before I REALLY get mad!
More like them will probably show up soon. \C[4]Davos\C[0], are
Not at all. They lost all of their power when the \C[6]Wardstone\C[0]
Then maybe they were on to something! Let's grab em' up and
That's a great idea, \C[4]Winter\C[0]! We can use the money
to help these poor people out of poverty!
Yeah. That's exactly what I was thinking.
Come on, let's gather them up. Great thinking, \C[4]Winter\C[0].
I must be rubbing off on you!
Well, you said you haven't been here in a thousand years, right?
No, it was. I'm sure of it. The shards are still warm. If I had
to guess, I would say this happened less than a day ago.
What we learned at the camp is accurate. \C[4]\N[5]\C[0]
is leading them right to the \C[6]Wardstones\C[0].
Then we can't delay. \C[4]Davos\C[0], you said there was a
hidden cave that lead to the seal?
Aye, and to the desert beyond, and the second \C[6]Wardstone\C[0].
The entrance lies at the northern tip of the mountain range outside
Let's go. If we hurry, maybe we can catch up to them!
